title: Impeachment moves to Senate: Leigh Ann Caldwell, Paul Kane and Steve Inskeep
description: As the House sends articles of impeachment to the Senate, NBC News Correspondent Leigh Ann Caldwell and Washington Post Senior Correspondent Paul Kane. NPR's Steve Inskeep discusses his book "Imperfect Union," about the political power couple he argues helped contribute to the start of the Civil War.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: As the House sends articles of impeachment to the Senate, NBC News Correspondent Leigh Ann Caldwell and Washington Post Senior Correspondent Paul Kane. NPR's Steve Inskeep discusses his book "Imperfect Union," about the political power couple he argues helped contribute to the start of the Civil War.
itunes:title: Impeachment moves to Senate: Leigh Ann Caldwell, Paul Kane and Steve Inskeep
itunes:author: NBC News
itunes:summary: A historic day in Congress as the third Senate impeachment trial for a U.S. president is set to begin.
